Html: when running a goblin file the program in the console says trial period 288/365 and increments daily im curious what is a trial and how do i go about ensuring this will not expire in a few months

that's not expiration date of Goblin. It's expiration date of ALVAR from VTT which is the marker tracking library we are using. I'm sure they will release a new version with new expiration date sometime soon.

Ohan

23 days more before end of trial period
how horrible
Hi I just received an answer from Alvar team. They have released recompiled version of Alvar 1 without the time-bomb. It is now available for download!! cheers!!
